content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19388,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/421eabc8-1a25-4fa6-aee5-943af853f788/7_eng.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/421eabc8-1a25-4fa6-aee5-943af853f788/7_eng.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"7_eng.png\",\"name\":\"7_eng.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"421eabc8-1a25-4fa6-aee5-943af853f788\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Community\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"communities\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are an amazing cultural experience that emerges at the crossroads of accumulated expertise, the urge for networking, and the desire for self-identification across different locations, technologies, and domains. Communities help employees share experience and knowledge, grow as speakers, and bring together people from different offices and cities. People have been and will always be the heart of communities. No matter the goals, communities always aim to improve the experience of our team members at EPAM and beyond. You can join any of our JS communities as an attendee or a speaker. Or you can start a new community! Share your ideas with your RM or HR ðŸ˜‰. Visit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are community\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to find communities by topic or location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":73161,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aac6aa64-c61a-48f7-a33a-c052891c17dd/8_fix.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aac6aa64-c61a-48f7-a33a-c052891c17dd/8_fix.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8_fix.png\",\"name\":\"8_fix.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aac6aa64-c61a-48f7-a33a-c052891c17dd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":460.83444976076555},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
